document_data.caption: A holy paragon of Torm.
document_data.name: Paragon
document_data.mainbody: '''Paragons''' were [[specialty priest]]s of the [[Church of Torm]] who behaved more like [[paladin]]s and maintained a close relationship with the church mainly around [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]].<ref name="WaPotR-p115" >
document_data.Activities: These individuals performed specific quests in [[Torm]]'s honor, hoping along the way to attract more followers for their god through their virtuous example. They were required to complete difficult heroic quests in order to advance their station.
document_data.Culture: Paragons were completely loyal to Torm and took any vows with extreme devotion. All paragons were [[human]].
document_data.Abilities: Paragons shared all of the abilities of a paladin save for their spell abilities. They also shared all of a paladin's weaknesses.
document_data.Possessions: Paragons wore white [[plate mail]] polished to a glistening shine. Large white [[helmet]]s and sky-blue [[cloak]]s completed their ensemble. They usually did not carry a [[shield]] since most wielded either a [[two-handed sword]] or a [[bastard sword]] with two hands.
